about_the_game:
about the game
Welcome to the abandoned city.
All that's left in this city are zombies, and maybe they're interested in 'you'.
At the moment you are isolated, sure to die, but you have to hold on for as long as you can.
Do you happen to know if someone will see your desperate uprising and rescue you...You are penniless in the game
Go around the city, get weapons, resist
It can also be cleared by thoroughly inducing zombies to avoid them,
It's not a bad idea to wipe out your visible enemies!
All you have to do is fill the 'score' before you die
Clear is up to you.
And I guarantee you, it won't be that easy.



gameplay
You will meet more and more zombies as time goes by,
As I said before, it's a good strategy to avoid
But if you can't avoid it and you can't handle it
Go through the map and arm yourself with a variety of weapons.
From simple but reliable pipe pistols
Even a mini gun that's not afraid of 1:50
Arm yourself with a lot of weapons
Don't forget to count the bullets.



If you feel normal mode is easy, or if you're skilled at it at the equivalent level, try hard mode!
Faster and stronger enemies, higher limit scores, and more scarce supplies are waiting for you.
You should think as efficiently and strategically as possible one by one.
Don't think too long. We won't have much time



Any bugs, inquiries, or suggestions in the game can be found in the Steam app evaluation
Please contact me through the given email address!
Opinions of all kinds are always welcome.
